scripts.install: cd react && rm -rf node_modules && npm install & cd electron && rm -rf node_modules && npm install
scripts.dev: cd react && BROWSER=none npm run start & cd electron && ./node_modules/.bin/electron .
scripts.pre-build: npm install && rm -rf .tmp && cd ./electron && npm install --only=production && cd .. && cp -r ./electron ./.tmp && cd ./react && npm install --only=production && npm run build && cd .. && cp -r react/build .tmp && cd .tmp && mv -f index.prod.js index.js
scripts.build: npm run pre-build && cd .tmp && ../node_modules/.bin/electron-builder && cd .. && rm -rf .tmp
scripts.publish: export $(cat .env | xargs) && npm run pre-build && cd .tmp && ../node_modules/.bin/electron-builder -p onTagOrDraft && cd .. && rm -rf .tmp
